description.full: Turning Point: Fall of Liberty presents an alternate history in which Winston Churchill dies in 1931, and without his strength England falls to Nazi Germany. The United States continues with their isolationist policy until 1952, when Nazi Germany invades the east coast en masse. Lead an everyman through missions in New York, Washington, D.C., London, and more!
description.short: Turning Point: Fall of Liberty presents an alternate history in which Winston Churchill dies in 1931, and without his strength England falls to Nazi Germany.
